text: Viktor Ivanovych Oparenyuk (; born 23 March 1969) is a former Ukrainian football player. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Nyva Vinnytsia players Category:FC CSKA Kyiv players Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Zhemchuzhina Sochi players Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Volgar Astrakhan players Category:FC Chortkiv players Category:FC Shakhter Karagandy players Category:Expatriate footballers in Kazakhstan Category:FC Okzhetpes players Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany Category:Association football defenders
title: Viktor Oparenyuk
